mapper.select: select * from food where maker like '%#{maker}%'
select * from food where material like '%#{material}%'
select * from food where name like '%#{name}%'
select * from takenfood where user_email = #{email} and food_code = #{code}
mapper.insert: insert into takenfood (user_email, food_code, quantity) values(#{email},#{code},#{quantity})
mapper.update: update takenfood set quantity = #{quantity} where user_email =#{email} and food_code=#{code}
mapper.delete: delete from takenfood where user_email = #{email} and food_code = #{code}
